tutorials.title: Helical Processing Case Study: EMPIAR-10031 (MAVS)
tutorials.description: Detailed description of the helical processing workflow in cryoSPARC from particle picking to reconstruction and refinement on this EMPIAR dataset.

tutorials.title: EER File Support
tutorials.description: CryoSPARC now supports reading input movies in electron-event representation (EER) format.

tutorials.title: 3D Variability Analysis Tutorial: Part One
tutorials.description: Introduction to 3DVA, a powerful tool for exploring discrete and continuous heterogeneity in SPA cryo-EM data.

tutorials.title: 3D Variability Analysis Tutorial: Part Two
tutorials.description: More advanced ways that 3DVA results can be used to interpret heterogeneity in a dataset.

tutorials.title: Priority Job Queuing
tutorials.description: All jobs in cryoSPARC now have a priority property that the cryoSPARC scheduler uses to sort jobs to be executed.
